page.title: Managing CF
page.content: Managing CF Managing cystic fibrosis can feel overwhelming at times — but we’re here to help. Learn how to navigate life with CF below. Health and Wellness Maintaining a healthy and fulfilled life Regular physical activity and good nutrition are important — especially when you have cystic fibrosis. By eating a high-calorie, high-fat diet,taking vitamins and mineral supplements, and staying fit, you can more effectively manage your CF and stay healthy. You can make an informed decision by learning about the different family building options and what parenting with CF could entail. Family Planning Fertility Pregnancy and CF Parenting as an Adult With CF Traveling with CF Exploring new things CF doesn't have to stop you from traveling to see the world or visit loved ones. With proper preparation and planning, taking care of your health while away from home may not be as hard as you think.
